Flub.Name: Precise
Flub.Description: Creates borders as per the terrain.

Flub.Name: Margin
Flub.Description: The amount of margin for borders.

Flub.Name: Falloff
Flub.Description: The soft falloff at the edge.

Flub.Name: Auto
Flub.Description: When auto is checked falloff amount is auto applied.

Flub.Name: Power
Flub.Description: The amount of blur applied at the edges.

Flub.Name: Iterations
Flub.Description: The iterations of blur to be processed.
